meanings.definition: A person or group that gives awards.
meanings.sent1: The awarders presented the trophy to the winner.
meanings.sent2: The awarders were impressed by the talent of the performers.
meanings.sent3: The awarders joked that they should give themselves an award for organizing such a successful event.
meanings.sent4: The awarders were like shining stars in the eyes of the recipients.
meanings.sent5: The awarders' smiles lit up the room as they handed out certificates.

meanings.definition: To give or grant an award.
meanings.sent1: She awarders her students for their hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent2: The committee awarders the best film of the year.
meanings.sent3: He awarders his dog with treats for learning a new trick.
meanings.sent4: The company awarders employees who go above and beyond their duties.
meanings.sent5: The teacher awarders a gold star to the student who answered the most questions correctly.
